messages.title: BREXIT CAN BE BETTER
messages.content: Dear Voter, This general election is your chance to change politics for good in this country. For too long, the establishment parties have taken us for granted.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Alistair Lindsay promotes the defense of British values and the right to free speech.
The leaflet mentions a policy to ban non-British slugs, symbolizing a stance on immigration and control over borders.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Scrap the Illicit Gin License Fee
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The candidate suggests scrapping the illicit gin license fee, possibly symbolizing a reduction in taxes or regulatory burdens.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Put Our Fishmongers Before Foreign Aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: This policy emphasizes prioritizing local small businesses, such as fishmongers, over foreign aid expenditures.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Deliver At Least Five NHS Hospitals
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet pledges to deliver at least five NHS hospitals, focusing on healthcare infrastructure.
A statement likely symbolizing reclaiming British sovereignty or traditions.

issues.economy: Scrap the Illicit Gin License Fee
issues.health: Deliver At Least Five NHS Hospitals

quotes.text: This general election is your chance to change politics for good in this country.

images.caption: Alistair Lindsay, UKIP candidate for Hertford & Stortford
